Beware the way locals drive: racing along the narrow and bendy roads in the hills.
Olbia has the only mall and only McDonalds for hundreds of miles.  To most, that is a good thing.

Ristorante Gallura is certainly one of the best restaurants in Italy; it may also rank among the great restaurants of the world. Rita Denza, the chef, has been there since 1945, and she has an absolute mastery of the kitchen.

value: content=Great family run restaurant with friendly service and typical Sardinian dishes. Cheap with plentiful helpings.
address=Via Mare Adriatico 34 - Golfo Aranci - 07026 Pittulongu Olbia
content=4 star beach hotel located in front of the sea, with restaurant, panoramic terrrace and swimming pool."

You may encounter poor road conditions, with potholes and open grids. Also the skill of some drivers leaves something to be desired. For girls it's better not to walk alone late at night,  just to avoid the possibility to meet drunk homeless (usually harmless though).
